subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Scottie Reynolds scored 27 points for 13th-ranked Villanova, which continued its dominant Big East run with a 102-84 victory over No. 10 Marquette.
snippet: Scottie Reynolds scored 27 points for 13th-ranked Villanova, which continued its dominant Big East run with a 102-84 victory over No. 10 Marquette.
